uk.ac.cam.gurdon

Class Tipper

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.cam.gurdon.Tipper

  • public class Tipper
extends java.lang.Object
    Finds the most likely tip positions of non-branched processes.
    Author:
    Richard Butler

    • Method Detail

      • findTip

        public ij.gui.Roi findTip(ij.ImagePlus imp,
                          ij.gui.Roi processRoi,
                          java.awt.Point base,
                          int measureC,
                          int time,
                          boolean fit)
        Finds a process tip based on distance from the base and optionally signal maxima in the specified channel.
        Parameters:
        imp - The image containing the process
        processRoi - The Roi representing the process
        base - The coordinates of the process base
        measureC - The channel index for intensity measurement
        time - The time index of the process
        fit - true if the tip position should be adjusted based on maxima in the measurement channel, false otherwise
        Returns:
        The Roi representing the process tip
